newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Seagate EPS view cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Seagate EPS view cut.

text.p: Salomon Brothers said it trimmed its earnings expectations on Seagate Technology Inc to $3.32 a share from $3.40 a share for the full 1997 fiscal year ending in June.
-- said trimmed the 1997 fourth quarter estimates to $0.94 a share from $1.02 a share.
-- said the 1998 earnings estimates remain unchanged at $4.92 a share.
-- Seagate said Monday it sees its fourth-quarter results coming in lower than expected because of weak demand for its high-performance computer disk drive products.
